Title: Give Blood
Plot:
The boys try to earn money by donating blood at a local blood drive...they end up with no money and give a LITTLE bit more blood than they bargained for.

Olivia Newton-John - "Physical"
The Ramones - "I Wanna Be Sedated"
Big Daddy Kane with Barry White - "All Of Me Wants All Of You"
Judas Priest - "Painkiller"
Concrete Blond - "Bloodletting"
